title: alaiyamal paarumayya
sahitya:
alaiyAmal pArumayyA en pEi manam kulaiyAmal vArumayyA ambalavANA



anupallavi



shilai pOlE nilai peTra dhyAna samAdhiyil shiva bhOgamuNDiDum tavam sheyya vENDinEn



caraNam



pOi kaNDu vilakkiya mei kaNDa yOgiyin bOdhattai anudinam sAdanam

sheididak

kai kaNDa jnAnattai kAlattil udaviya kaDavuLE unniDam dhrDa bhakti koNDiDa
